definition: enormously proud of one's success (idiom); smug/complacent
to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to waver
to hesitate
Manchu ethnic group
to fill/full/filled/packed/fully/completely/quite/to reach the limit/to satisfy/satisfied/contented
aspiration/ambition/the will

sentences.english: She is ambitious to get through high school in two years.
sentences.chinese: 她躊躇滿志，要在兩年內完成高中學業。

sentences.english: The sweat blood treasure horse, the lance shake hands, the helmet is shining, I am puffed up with pride and violent.
sentences.chinese: 汗血寶馬，長劍握手，盔甲閃亮，我躊躇滿志而強悍。

sentences.english: Despite many setbacks over the past two years, he is still hopeful.
sentences.chinese: 雖然過去兩年遭遇了不少失敗，但他還是躊躇滿志。

sentences.english: Two degree vehicle net Hangzhou person in charge is smug .
sentences.chinese: 二度車網杭州負責人躊躇滿志。
